answer_1: To get the value of an element

title: What does the 'isNaN()' function in JavaScript do?
answer_1: Checks if a value is not a number
answer_2: Converts a value to a number
answer_3: Checks if a value is a number
answer_4: Converts a value to a string
right_answer: Checks if a value is not a number

title: In programming, what is a 'function'?

answer_3: A way to style elements on a web page
right_answer: A block of code that performs a specific task
